description: Two men in a canoe are being pursued down a jungle river by four figures in another canoe carrying spears. The pursued's canoe is equipped with a hidden outboard motor, giving them a technological advantage over the spear-wielding figures. The absurdity arises from the question asked by one of the pursued, expressing concern about the speed of their less technologically advanced pursuers. This creates irony, highlighting the unexpected dynamic of the chase.
caption: "Are they gaining, Huxley?"
